job_tasks.phrase: translating business objectives into technical plans
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding business needs and converting them into actionable technical strategies.

job_tasks.phrase: identifying and quantifying AI project value
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of understanding the business impact and worth of AI projects.

job_tasks.phrase: criteria for AI vs. GenAI use in business applications
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding how AI technologies can be applied to solve business problems.

job_tasks.phrase: develop comprehensive, engaging course content on AI fundamentals, LLM architectures, AI project planning, and Generative AI applications
job_tasks.justification: The core of the role is developing educational content that explains AI and GenAI concepts and architectures.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop modules on the basics of AI, Generative AI, and Large Language Models (LLM) architectures.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions developing content about AI and LLM architectures, which are core to modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide overviews of traditional AI approaches (ML, NLP, DL, RL) and contrast them with Generative AI techniques.
job_tasks.justification: This involves explaining various AI modeling techniques, both traditional and generative.

job_tasks.phrase: when to use ML vs. LLM models.
job_tasks.justification: This requires understanding and explaining the application of different types of models.

job_tasks.phrase: Deliver content on Transformer, GAN, and other LLM architectures, including multimodal LLMs.
job_tasks.justification: This is directly about explaining and teaching various LLM architectures, a core modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop course material on different LLM architectures, such as Llama3 and Gemma 2
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on the specific architectures of LLMs.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide instruction on model evaluation, token counting
job_tasks.justification: This pertains to the process of assessing and understanding the performance of models.

job_tasks.phrase: Teach concepts of LLM alignment, including RLHF and feedback models, along with instruction tuning for LLMs.
job_tasks.justification: This covers advanced techniques for tuning and aligning LLMs.

job_tasks.phrase: Design modules on fine-tuning using libraries like Hugging Face, with techniques such as PEFT, QLORA, and AdaLORA.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of fine-tuning LLMs, a key modeling activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide instruction on architecting production-grade RAG pipelines
job_tasks.justification: RAG pipeline architecture is a modeling task within GenAI.

job_tasks.phrase: Explain when to use RAG vs. fine-tuning in AI applications.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding and differentiating between modeling approaches.

job_tasks.phrase: Teach metrics and best practices for LLM evaluation, including BLEU, ROUGE, and MMLU.
job_tasks.justification: This focuses on evaluating the performance of language models.

job_tasks.phrase: design content on AI regulations and ethics, covering governance and responsible AI practices
job_tasks.justification: While ethics is a soft skill, designing content about it touches upon the responsible application of AI modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Teach the basics of AI agents, Langgraph, and Autogen for multi-agent collaboration and task management.
job_tasks.justification: This involves explaining AI agent architectures and their functionalities.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop lessons on vector and graph databases for AI applications
job_tasks.justification: This involves explaining how databases are integrated into AI applications, which is a software development aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: Explore various database platforms, such as Singlestore, MongoDB, and Milvus, for AI app integration.
job_tasks.justification: This relates to understanding and explaining the integration of specific database technologies into AI applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Deploying and scaling LLMs on cloud platforms
job_tasks.justification: This touches on the software engineering aspects of deploying and scaling AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: optimizing inference with ML hardware accelerators
job_tasks.justification: This relates to the software engineering optimization for inference performance.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing ML guardrails and compliance measures for LLM use
job_tasks.justification: This involves building or explaining the implementation of security and compliance measures, a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: collecting user feedback for continuous improvement
job_tasks.justification: This relates to the iterative development cycle in software, often involving user feedback.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide instruction on MLOps, DevOps, and AIOps, including CI/CD, monitoring, and detecting model drift.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions MLOps and related operational practices.

job_tasks.phrase: deployment options
job_tasks.justification: This relates to how models are deployed and managed in production, a key MLOps concern.

soft_skills.phrase: navigate and innovate within the rapidly evolving AI landscape
create criteria for AI vs. GenAI use in business applications
Design courses on identifying and quantifying AI project value
Teach methods for selecting appropriate technologies and models for specific business needs.
innovate within the rapidly evolving AI landscape

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes developing course content on LLM architectures, RAG, fine-tuning techniques (PEFT, QLORA), prompt engineering, and AI agents, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile. It also includes the software development aspects of integrating these technologies and operational considerations like MLOps.
